scripts.dev-env:up: npm run decrypt && docker compose up dev-db frontend backend
scripts.test-env:up: npm run decrypt && docker compose --env-file .env.test up test-db frontend backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:front && npm run lint:back
scripts.format: npm run format:back && npm run format:front
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup:stop; npm run cleanup:containers ; npm run cleanup:images ; npm run cleanup:volumes ; npm run cleanup:network
scripts.prisma:studio:dev: docker exec backend npx prisma studio
scripts.prisma:db:seed: docker exec backend npx prisma db seed
scripts.prisma:studio:test: docker exec -it backend npx dotenv -e .env.test -- prisma studio
scripts.prisma:migrate: docker exec -it backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:reset: docker exec -it backend npx prisma migrate reset -f
scripts.db:dev:restart: npm run dev:db:rm && npm run dev:db:up
scripts.backend:restart: npm run backend:rm && npm run backend:up
scripts.test:db:restart: npm run test:db:rm && npm run test:db:up
scripts.prisma:reset:test: docker exec -it backend npx dotenv -e .env.test -- prisma db push --force-reset
scripts.backend:test:e2e: npm run prisma:reset:test && docker exec -it backend npx dotenv -e .env.test -- npm run test:e2e
scripts.backend:test:coverage: npm run prisma:reset:test && docker exec -it backend npx dotenv -e .env.test -- npm run test:e2e:coverage
scripts.backend:test:unit: docker exec -it backend npx dotenv -e .env.test -- npm run test:watch

engines.yarn: YARN NO LONGER USED - use npm instead.
